messages.noConnection: Connection is not established. Trying again.

unavailable.title: Feature unavailable
unavailable.body: Unfortunately this feature is not accessible at the moment. Please try again later.

fallbackScreen.title: Whoops! Something went wrong
fallbackScreen.detailsLabelDefaultMessage: This is not an error, this screen will allow you to detect and view errors in the app, displaying a friendly message instead of the default white screen.
